My work experience

Access Development

Associate Product Manager

Access Development works with Clients to provide benifits for their members. We provide customizable benefit website and app. My job responsiblities inlcude actively communicating with product team, developers and designer on clarifying goals and priorities, defining feature details and execution plan, writing epic and requirement tickets and manage project progess in Jira, testing and tracking feature performance in Heap, learning user experience through survey and interview and keeping product and dev documentations in Confluence.

Feb 2023 - Present

ShopShops

Product Manager Intern

Shopshops is an e-Commerce Livestream shopping App. I worked closely with designer on user research, coming up with improved feature deisgn. I also worked with data team to analysis corrolation between user behavior and conversion rate. We used Agile methodoligy with 2 weeks of development circle, my job responsiblities include writing and delivering product requirement documentation to developers.

May 2022 - Aug 2022

Seeker

Co-founder, Product manager, Software engineer, Content creater

Seeker is an online community for women in the workplace where females can freely express themselves, help each other and grow all together. I gathered a group of 20 amazing female tech-workers through Douban. We aim to bring up awareness of female-friendliness and help women in the workplace to protect their rights by creating a safe space for everyone.

Oct 2021 - Present

Aqua Selection

Quant Developer Intern

Aqua Selection is an investment firm mainly trades in futures, stock and crypto market. I was responsible for maintaining and optimizing a database interface with python for fetching futures, stock and crypto data from multiple APIs and manage data in MongoDB through pymongo. I also constructed a news crawling program via selenium and webdriver to gather and update latest news from open websites. All my work have increased transaction efficiency for the traders.

Apr 2021 - Jul 2021

Long Term Care Analytic

Research Assistant

I worked with Professor Lu from Purdue Krannert School of Management to build a website to help users find a perfect nursing home for their family with the information related to COVID-19. I did a lot of researches in the nursing home system, including what aspects are needed when evaluating a nursing home, the relationship between government, nursing home and hospitals, what people's concerns are when it comes to a nursing home. With all the information I gathered, I designed and built the demo version of the webiste with TypeScript, JavaScript via React.js, Node.js, Mongoose and MongoDB.

Sep 2020 - Dec 2020

Purdue BARC Lab

Research Assistant

I worked for Purdue BARC Lab with professor Garman to research on building an identification tool of cryptographic algorithms in binaries. With my previous research experience in deep learning, I was responsible for finding related existing work and explain the machine learning part from the papers to my team members.

May 2020 - Aug 2020

CAC Auto Group

Software Engineer Intern

CAC Auto Group is a second hand car trade company. I wored with a develope team to build the 1.0 version of the website using JavaScript via AngularJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS and MongoDB. The 1.0 function has functionalities for users to browse over products and make purchase, also for employees at different positions to manage transaction process and database information. Current verison is developed based on that.

May 2019 - Aug 2019

My Projects

Event Manage Server

a course project for Advanced Software engineering at Columbia

I worked with three other group members to build a server that helps find event times and location that work for a given group of people with certain availability. I learned a decent amount of knowlodge in iteration circle for designing and building software. I designed and built the RESTful API with Java Spring framewokr and managed MongoDB database with MongoTemplate. I also coded the testing while building up the server side with Junit and mockito.

Sep 2021 - Dec 2021

Squid Game AI

a course project for Artificial Intelligence at Columbia

I designed an AI opponent for a squid game designed by course TAs, which is an extension of Wumpus world. I implemented Minimax, ExpectiMinimax, Alpha-Beta Pruning with improved Heuristics under Time and Depth Constraints. My AI opponent can beat the other opponents most of the time. Check out the source code here;)

Sep 2021 - Dec 2021

Mock TCP protocol

a course project for Computer Networks at Columbia

I implemented implements a TCP-like protocol on top of UDP in python and tested it with newudpl-1.7 for mocking environment. It support variable window size, and can recover from data loss, data corruption, and data delay. Check out the source code here;)

Sep 2021 - Dec 2021

RR arm robot motion planning

a course project for Computational Aspect of Robotics at Columbia

I built a RRT for RR arm motion planning tool. Portion of the code are accredited to the PythonRobotics project. Check out the demo here;)

Sep 2021 - Dec 2021

Shell project

a course project for System Programming at Purdue University

I built a shell interpreter which combines behavior from common shells including bash and csh with shell script, lex & yacc and C language. Check out the source code here;)

Sep 2021 - Dec 2021

Interpolate project

a side project at Purdue University

I worked with a group of computer science students to develope a website that provide an environment where users can join groups or classes, upload and comment on pdf file and share academic insights with each other grounded upon TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS via AngularJS, Node.js, Express.js, Mongoose and MongoDB

Jan 2019 - May 2019
